txt.en: 'Right then, let us hie ourselves from this stinking tunnel. We wouldn't want Rodelleth and her Elves getting lonesome for lack of our company, would we?'
'Let us be upon our task, shall we?'
Instance: Death From Below
'We've got to buy Vatnar time to undo the goblin's handywork. Come, help me guard this corridor.'
'Now we've got to deal with this tunnel, or they'll just be back in here in a day's time.'
A dwarf-ally has been defeated
'That will do for you, you great stupid hulk!'
You are victorious!
'Less talking and more fighting, Thyrnir! This is delicate work here....'
Speak with Vatnar and begin your counterattack against the goblin-sappers!
Talk to Vatnar to return to the surface.
'That's it, they are all done. Now RUN!'
'Keep it quick, then! We've not got all day.'
'For Thráin and the glory of the Lonely Mountain!'
'Right then, let us be off! We have goblins to slay!'
'Over here, [placeholder]! This is where we shall make our stand! Just stay clear of that powder there....'
'Hurry it up, Vatnar! They know we're here now, and they have plenty of reinforcements coming!'
Talk to Vatnar
Destroy the goblin-tunnel
Talk to Vatnar
'This is the last one... when it is set, run for your lives!'
'Just a moment... a little something for later.'
'Done! I've got them all... let us be away!'

Vatnar has detected a band of goblin-sappers digging a tunnel below the cellars of Thangúlhad. He and his brother Thyrnir intend to invade the goblin-tunnel and collapse it before they can undermine the tower's foundation.\n\n<rgb=#00ff00>WARNING: Death From Below is a high difficulty solo challenge quest. Beware, all who enter therein.</rgb>
'That's one we won't have to worry about. It looks like there are three more to go. Save a few of those goblins for me!'
'By Durin's Beard! We're not a moment too soon. They've set their powder!'
'Ha! That got him!'
'This will be it then... the goblin-tunnel should be just beyond this wall.'
'There, that's the third. One to go!'
'That's it! Onwards!'
'Hurry it up over there, Vatnar! My beard's not getting any shorter while you dally about!'
'That's the second... two to go.'
'You said you wanted to fight goblins, Thyrnir? Now's your chance!'
'Bah! I prefer a good axe myself, but have it your way, Vatnar.'
'This is the shaft they came in through. If we bring this down, it will be some time before they can get in again.'
'That's no goblin... that's a cave-troll! Run for it!'
'Aye! That did it! Well fought, [placeholder]! The goblins' works are broken, and the remaining sappers seem to have run off.\n\n'It must have been that scowl of yours that did it....'
'I did not say I wanted to fight ALL of them, you daft fool! Now hurry!'
